Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and the time we've invested in its development, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $150. This is an excellent chance to experience the benefits of our product at a premium rate. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
